channel.title: Cores on React 源码分析
channel.description: Recent content in Cores on React 源码分析

item.title: Codebase Overview
item.description: External Dependencies React has almost no external dependencies. Usually, a require() points to a file in React’s own codebase. However, there are a few relatively rare exceptions. The [fbjs repository](“#”) exists because React shares some small utilities with libraries like Relay, and we keep them in sync. We don’t depend on equivalent small modules in the Node ecosystem because we want Facebook engineers to be able to make changes to them whenever necessary.
